item.title: Road subsiding next to recent water emergency repair, 18th August
item.description:
In middle of southbound lane approx. 5m from junction with Mead Road. Adjacent to square of new tarmac from Severn Trent emergency repair about 2 weeks ago. Subsidence 1st notice a week ago (but very minor), today visibly worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing Manhole cover, 18th August
item.description:
This drain has a missing cover - someone has put some MDF over it which has gone all soggy. I wouldnt want a pedestrian to fall in here as they will sue you for damages. It looks like a land drain. Although on the verge, I understand Verges are there to allow emergency services to pass etc, https://what3words.com/holds.gifts.hosts

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
